DOC.brief_summary: Some study value effectiveness botulinum toxin . Results contradictory need study . The purpose study compare effectiveness botulinum toxin injection placebo treatment tennis elbow unrelieved usual medical care perform 6 month . Method : It double blind randomize controlled trial . Principal criteria assessment Pain intensity three month injection .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Botulinum Toxin Injection Tennis Elbow Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: - Principal Objective : The first aim study value effectiveness botulinum toxin injection treatment tennis elbow unrelieved usual medical care perform 6 months.. - Secondary Objective : The second aim study document tennis elbow history one year follow initial injection - Study design : It double blind randomize controlled trial . Principal criteria assessment Pain intensity three month injection . - Inclusion criterion : tennis elbow 6 month ; signature consent - Exclusion criterion : Non inclusion criterion : less 18 year old ; osteoarthritis elbow , refer cervical pain , fibromyalgia , pregnancy , myasthenia , polymyositis , SLA , anticoagulant treatment , aminosides ; diabetes , alcoholism - Study plan : randomized parallel group - Number subject : 60
DOC.criteria: Tennis elbow 6 month Signature consent Less 18 year old Osteoarthritis elbow Referred cervical pain Fibromyalgia Pregnancy Myasthenia Polymyositis SLA Anticoagulant treatment Aminosides Diabetes Alcoholism Previous botulinum toxin A injection
